subject: College Athletics
Suits and Litigation
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Mike McQueary, a former Penn State graduate assistant, has sued the university on Tuesday for what he calls defamation and misrepresentation involving the Jerry Sandusky child abuse scandal.
snippet: Mike McQueary, a former Penn State graduate assistant, has sued the university on Tuesday for what he calls defamation and misrepresentation involving the Jerry Sandusky child abuse scandal.
